hero.title: AI Agents for
hero.subtitle: Our AI agents analyze hundreds of companies, read financial statements, monitor trades and news to identify profitable opportunities using methodologies from legendary investors like Warren Buffett, Cathie Wood, and more.

aiAgents.title: Meet Your AI Investment Agents
aiAgents.subtitle: Our AI agents analyze hundreds of companies using the methodologies of legendary investors, identifying both short-term trading and long-term investment opportunities.
aiAgents.dailyAnalysis: Our agents analyze 500+ companies daily across 11 sectors

buffett.name: Warren Buffett
buffett.philosophy: Value investing with focus on companies with strong moats, excellent management, and trading below intrinsic value. Buy wonderful companies at fair prices.

cathie-wood.name: Cathie Wood
cathie-wood.philosophy: Focus on disruptive innovation and exponential growth opportunities. Invest in companies leading technological revolutions across AI, robotics, genomics, and blockchain.

lynch.name: Peter Lynch
lynch.philosophy: Look for understandable growth companies at reasonable prices with potential to grow earnings faster than the market.

dalio.name: Ray Dalio
dalio.philosophy: Understanding economic cycles and market dynamics to build all-weather portfolios that can thrive in any environment.

graham.name: Benjamin Graham
graham.philosophy: Buy stocks trading significantly below their intrinsic value with a strong margin of safety.

buffett.name: Warren Buffett
buffett.philosophy: Value investing with focus on companies with strong moats, excellent management, and trading below intrinsic value. Buy wonderful companies at fair prices.

cathie-wood.name: Cathie Wood
cathie-wood.philosophy: Focus on disruptive innovation and exponential growth opportunities. Invest in companies leading technological revolutions across AI, robotics, genomics, and blockchain.

lynch.name: Peter Lynch
lynch.philosophy: Invest in what you know. Look for growth at a reasonable price (GARP). Find companies with strong fundamentals that Wall Street has overlooked.

dalio.name: Ray Dalio
dalio.philosophy: All-weather portfolio approach focusing on risk parity and understanding economic cycles. Diversification across asset classes to weather any economic environment.

graham.name: Benjamin Graham
graham.philosophy: Buy stocks trading significantly below their intrinsic value with a margin of safety. Focus on financial stability and avoid speculation.
